*Fortify Health is Hiring For Remote roles* 

1️⃣ Partnerships Manager: They will lead and strengthen partnerships with government bodies and NGOs, driving the implementation of wheat flour fortification initiatives. 

2️⃣ Finance Officer: They will support Fortify Health’s financial operations, ensuring efficient vendor and expense management, and assist in financial reporting and audits. 

3️⃣ (Senior) Quality Officer: They will oversee quality assurance and control for wheat flour fortification, ensuring high standards and regulatory compliance across our mills.

Join us in making a impact on the health of millions.
